full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS GTOR BZLOG BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(DE LTAR RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB LA BRTEN PA'I GTOR BZLOG BYA TSUL GYI RIM PA 'DI NI, LDONG RIGS SU SKYES PA'I RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL BA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOR 'BOD PAS, RANG GI NYE 'KHOR DU 'KHOD PA'I LHA BZO DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS, ,MING GZHAN AA CHI THU DAR KH'AN JU RA CHIR 'BOD PAS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,SHING SPRUL HOR ZLA DRUG PA'I DMAR PHYOGS KYI TSES BRGYAD LA, 'JU LAG GI KLUNG 'GRAM DU SBYAR BA THOG MAR YI GER 'GOD PA PO NI SANGS RGYAS SKYABS KYIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI GTOR BZLOG GI CHO GA DAM PA GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA MA MTHONG BAS, ,STONG 'KHOR MANYDZU SHRI LNGA PAS 'DI NYID, ,RTA MCHOG ROL BA'I RNAL 'BYOR BA RNAMS LA NYER MKHO MED MI RUNG DU MTHONG NAS, ,DHARMA BADZRA GYIS DBANG DU BSKRUN PA LAGS SO, ,)
